Catalano.Neuro

Class Neuron

  • java.lang.Object
    • Catalano.Neuro.Neuron
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActivationNeuron, DistanceNeuron

    public abstract class Neuron
extends java.lang.Object
    Base neuron class.

      • range

        protected static FloatRange range
        Random generator range. Sets the range of random generator. Affects initial values of neuron's weight. Default value is [0, 1].
